<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o butterbr.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 ; White noise
asig rand 0.5 outs asig, asig
endin
instr 2 ; filtered noise
asig rand 0.7 abr butterbr asig, 3000, 2000 ;center frequency = 3000, bandwidth = +/- (2000)/2, so 2000-4000 outs abr, abr
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 2 i 2 2.5 2
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
